title: Average player salary in MLS by team 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Salary in thousand U.S. dollars for 23 number of Teams.
Team Toronto FC has the highest Salary in thousand U.S. dollars and Houston Dynamo has the lowest Salary in thousand U.S. dollars.
The difference of Salary in thousand U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Team is 706.89.

The Salary in thousand U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Team Toronto FC and lowest at Team Houston Dynamo.
The highest Team Toronto FC has 706.89 more Salary in thousand U.S. dollars than the lowest Team Houston Dynamo.
Team Toronto FC is higher than any other Teams with value 902.41, followed by , and New York City FC. Down to Team Houston Dynamo with the lowest value 195.52.
